item.title: YiTab Privacy Policy
item.description:
Effective Date: August 5, 2025

YiTab is a minimalist Chrome new tab extension. We take your privacy seriously. Please read the following privacy policy to understand how we handle your information.

ðŸ“Œ Data Collection and Use

  • YiTab does not collect, store, or upload any personal data.
  • All user settings (such as shortcuts, custom backgrounds, etc.) are stored locally in your browser only.
  • The extension does not connect to any third-party servers while running.
  • No browsing history, behavior, or identity information is tracked.

ðŸ”’ Local Storage

  • The extension uses Chrome’s local storage (chrome.storage.local) to save user preferences.
  • All data remains in your browser and is never transmitted over the network.
  • You can clear this data anytime through the Chrome extension management panel.

ðŸ”— Third-Party Data Sharing

  • YiTab does not share any user data with third parties.
  • We do not sell or provide any information to advertisers or analytics services.

âœ… User Control

  • You can disable or uninstall YiTab at any time through the Chrome Extensions Manager.
  • Clearing browser data or reinstalling the extension will remove all locally stored settings.

ðŸ“ž Contact Us

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this privacy policy, please contact us at:
